titleStmt.title: King Charls his tryal at the high court of justice sitting in Westminster Hall, begun on Saturday, Jan. 20, ended Jan. 27, 1648 also His Majesties speech on the scaffold immediately before his execution on Tuesday, Ian. 30 : together with the several speeches of Duke Hamilton, the Earl of Holland, and the Lord Capel, immediately before their execution on Friday, March 9, 1649.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Holland, Henry Rich, Earl of, 1590-1649.
Hamilton, James Hamilton, Duke of, 1606-1649.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, much enlarged and faithfully corrected.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Peter Cole, Francis Tyton, and John Playford,

notesStmt.note: "The several speeches of Duke Hamilton ... and Arthur Lord Capel upon the scaffold" (p. 85) has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
